metadata.description:
# Gold Lion Club 2023 
 - Redlion Gazette Subscription 
 - REGULAR SUB 
 
 ###Full year of Redlion Gazettes & ArtDrops at a discount! 
 
 This is the greatest value recommended for Redlion Gazette enthusiasts. Gold Lion Club members get every weekly Gazette at a 23% discount! Thatâ€™s 52 Gazettes, 52 Artdrops and a Gold Lion Club subscriber token for less than $10 per NFT. Subscribers that sign up during the 2023 will pay a prorated price depending on the number of weeks left in the year. You will be able to mint the current live issue and all issues till the end of the year with this token. 
 
 - Save ~30% on Gazette weekly full price 
 - You can claim your Gazette during 2023 
 - Exclusive premium content with owned Gazettes 
 - Discord contestant position for games 
 
 [**Subscribe Now**](https://gazette.red/subscribe)
metadata.name: #1 Gold Lion Club
